User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap
Sitemap: https://coinface.fun/sitemap.xml

# Disallow admin or private areas (if any)
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /private/

# Allow all other content
Allow: /coin/
Allow: /memedrop/
Allow: /assets/
Allow: /uploads/

# Crawl delay (optional)
Crawl-delay: 1
